# composer 自动加载分析

> 必学

## 启动 - 分析

- autoload.php

```
<?php

// autoload.php @generated by Composer

require_once __DIR__ . '/composer/autoload_real.php';

return ComposerAutoloaderInit005250a327ddaae4a2d813bdb2660649::getLoader();

# 初始化自动加载类
# 注册自动加载类
```


- autoload_real
```
public static function getLoader()
{

    if (null !== self::$loader) {
        return self::$loader;
    }

    spl_autoload_register(array('ComposerAutoloaderInit005250a327ddaae4a2d813bdb2660649', 'loadClassLoader'), true, true);
    self::$loader = $loader = new \Composer\Autoload\ClassLoader();
    spl_autoload_unregister(array('ComposerAutoloaderInit005250a327ddaae4a2d813bdb2660649', 'loadClassLoader'));

    $useStaticLoader = PHP_VERSION_ID >= 50600 && !defined('HHVM_VERSION') && (!function_exists('zend_loader_file_encoded') || !zend_loader_file_encoded());
    if ($useStaticLoader) {
        require_once __DIR__ . '/autoload_static.php';

        call_user_func(\Composer\Autoload\ComposerStaticInit005250a327ddaae4a2d813bdb2660649::getInitializer($loader));
    } else {
        $map = require __DIR__ . '/autoload_namespaces.php';
        foreach ($map as $namespace => $path) {
            $loader->set($namespace, $path);
        }

        $map = require __DIR__ . '/autoload_psr4.php';
        foreach ($map as $namespace => $path) {
            $loader->setPsr4($namespace, $path);
        }

        $classMap = require __DIR__ . '/autoload_classmap.php';
        if ($classMap) {
            $loader->addClassMap($classMap);
        }
    }

    $loader->register(true);

    return $loader;
}
```
